description: This is Eagle Ridge at its bestâ€”fully renovated, redesigned, and move-in ready. This 3-bed+den, 2-lvl TH features a standout 2-tone kitchen w/ heated floors, sage green + white shaker cabs, gold hardware, quartz counters, tile backsplash + S/S appls. Beautiful refinished solid birch HW floors, cozy wood burning fireplace, fresh paint, pot lights, updated doors/baseboards + sleek entry tile. Priv covered carport at your door; proactive complex w/ updated windows + roof. Short walking distance to Newport Village, Suter Brook, Coq Centre, parks, schools, daycares, hospital + SkyTrain. Book your showing today.
